snippet: A Vietnamese court on Wednesday convicted 14 democracy activists of plotting to overthrow the government and sentenced them to jail terms ranging from 3 to 13 years.
abstract: Vietnamese court convicts 14 bloggers, writers and political and social activists of plotting to overthrow the government and sentences them to jail terms ranging from 3 to 13 years in what human rights groups say is the largest subversion case to be brought in years.
lead_paragraph: A Vietnamese court on Wednesday convicted 14 democracy activists of plotting to overthrow the government and sentenced them to jail terms ranging from 3 to 13 years.

headline.seo: Activists Convicted in Vietnam Crackdown on Dissent
headline.main: Activists Convicted in Vietnam Crackdown on Dissent
headline.print_headline: Activists Convicted in Vietnam Crackdown on Dissent

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
